name: io.github.UI5/mcp-server
description: MCP server for UI5 application development

environmentVariables.description: A comma-separated list of domains that are allowed to be used in the 'oDataV4Url' parameter of the 'create_ui5_app' tool, for example: 'localhost, example.com, sub.example.com'. Set to an empty string to allow any domains. For wildcard subdomains, prefix the domain with a dot: '.example.com'. This will match 'www.example.com' but not 'example.com'.
environmentVariables.name: UI5_MCP_SERVER_ALLOWED_ODATA_DOMAINS

environmentVariables.description: Set to any value to disable structured content in the MCP server responses.
environmentVariables.name: UI5_MCP_SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_STRUCTURED_CONTENT

environmentVariables.description: Set to any value to disable resources in the MCP server responses, see https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2025-06-18/server/resource. This is useful for clients that do not support resources, see https://modelcontextprotocol.io/clients, such as Cursor or the Gemini CLI.
environmentVariables.name: UI5_MCP_SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESOURCES

environmentVariables.default: The '.ui5' directory in the user's home directory
environmentVariables.description: Directory where the MCP server stores its data, such as cached API references.
environmentVariables.name: UI5_DATA_DIR
